no_garage: No garage is set. You need to create one to control it. Please use the values set on the ESP8266.
error_invalid_number: The garage number is not a valid number.
error_invalid_address: The server address is not a valid URL.
error_requesting_status: An error occurred while requesting status.
error_sending_request: An error occurred while sending the command.
error_updating_garage_order: An error occurred while reordering the garage.
error_removing_garage: An error occurred while removing the garage.
warning_deleting: Are you sure you want to delete it?
warning_toggling: Are you sure you want to toggle the garage door?
